actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat a portion of tuition paid to certain educational institutions as a charitable contribution.

summary.text: Provides a tax deduction as a charitable contribution for 90 percent (up to $2500) of the tuition and fees paid to an educational institution which qualifies under the Internal Revenue Code as a recipient of deductible charitable contribution.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat a portion of tuition paid to certain educational institutions as a charitable contribution.
